item.title: The Story of This Car!
item.description: A deep dive into a car’s history, showing its past ownership, journey, and unique features that make it memorable or noteworthy.

media:content.media:description: A deep dive into a car’s history, showing its past ownership, journey, and unique features that make it memorable or noteworthy.

item.title: I Refuse to Fix This VW Tiguan
item.description: A frustrating VW Tiguan repair scenario, showing why the vehicle is a challenge, highlighting issues, and explaining the decision to walk away from fixing it.

item.title: 190K Mile BMW X5 Surprised Me!
item.description: A high-mileage BMW X5 that exceeded expectations, showing surprising performance and reliability—even for someone who isn’t a fan of BMWs.

item.title: Things to Know Before Changing a Timing Belt
item.description: Essential tips and precautions for changing a timing belt, showing what to check, tools needed, and common mistakes to avoid for a successful repair.

item.title: CVT Care: Don’t Drive Until You Do This
item.description: Essential tips for maintaining your CVT transmission, showing steps to prevent damage and ensure smooth performance before driving your vehicle.

item.title: Insider’s Guide to Ford: Picks & Warnings
item.description: Expert advice on Ford vehicles, highlighting top recommendations, potential pitfalls, and key insights to help buyers make informed decisions.

item.title: Customer Only Wants to Get It Running
item.description: A repair scenario where the customer’s goal is simply to get their vehicle running, showing the diagnostic process, quick fixes, and practical solutions.

item.title: The Most Bulletproof Car Ever Made
item.description: Exploring the features and design of the most bulletproof car ever built, highlighting armor, durability, and engineering that make it virtually unstoppable.

item.title: Dealer’s Mistake Nearly Broke This Lexus
item.description: A dealer error almost caused major damage to a Lexus LX450. We uncover what went wrong and how it was resolved before serious issues arose.

item.title: The Challenge of Maintaining Vintage Euro Cars
item.description: We explore why vintage European cars are difficult to maintain, covering common issues, repair challenges, and what owners need to keep them running.

item.title: Why He’s Losing Braking Pressure
item.description: We investigate the cause of a sudden loss of braking pressure, showing the problem, its impact, and how to fix it safely.

item.title: Best Small Truck to Buy
item.description: We break down top small truck options, comparing features, performance, and value to help you choose the best one for your needs.

item.title: When to Stop a Car Project
item.description: We explore the signs that indicate it’s time to end a car project, helping owners avoid wasted time, money, and frustration.

item.title: Owner Wants Repairs on a Budget
item.description: We tackle car repairs while keeping costs low, showing how to prioritize fixes and make smart choices when the owner doesn’t want to spend much.

item.title: CVT Care: What to Do Before Driving
item.description: Learn essential steps to protect your CVT transmission and prevent damage. Follow these tips before driving to extend your vehicle’s life and performance.

item.title: Car Wizard: Age Catches Up to Cars Too
item.description: We explore how aging affects vehicles, from wear and tear to performance, and what owners can do to keep their cars running longer.

item.title: The True Cost of Owning a Vintage Euro Car
item.description: We break down the real expenses of owning a vintage European car, from maintenance to repairs, so you know what it truly takes to keep it running.

item.title: I Know What's Causing That Car Noise
item.description: We pinpoint the exact cause of a car noise, explaining what’s happening and how to fix it so you never have to wonder again.

item.title: Lies People Tell in the Car Business
item.description: We expose the common lies and misleading tactics people use in the car industry, sharing real experiences and tips to spot them.

item.title: Identifying the Source of That Noise
item.description: We investigate a mysterious car noise and reveal exactly what's causing it.
